name: Surfing In Hell
description:
A re-release of "The Best Offense", a game I developed for the Curdle Jam #8! This version includes:

  • A much better title, let's be honest (hence the re-release)
  • The pillars the player stands on will now begin to fade away when the player touches them, and will fade back in a few seconds later, a feature I wanted in the original. This is to ensure you actually move around!
    • Updated tutorial text to match this change.
  • Fixed a bug where the high score was not being recorded on  the "Speed Demons" mode.
  • Fixed a bug where the restart button would require unpausing before actually doing its job.
  • New demon screech sounds (Credit to George Matta for an amazing job! All donations will go to treating his throat after his performance).
  • Added a credits page (So you know whose itch.io to visit! Hint: it's mine.)
